name: Oddsters: Idle Adventure
description:
Become a mastermind behind the self-manageable microcosm of a sorcerous living tree & its odd inhabitants in a new fantasy collection game!
Craft and collect your own odd but cute creatures – Oddsters, inhabit them in a friendly atmosphere, send them to explore the fantastic world around & see what they will bring you back!
Craft, explore, produce and collect!

Features:
• Stress-free idle adventures, where you can simply observe life in its beauty.
• Collect a bunch of a bit odd but super cute creatures - oddsters, whom you crafted yourself!
• House all your tiny friends in a sorcery atmosphere of a living tree.
• Send your oddsters on a quest of exploring the fantastic world around!
• Enjoy minigames while exploring and get more bonuses for those!
• Gather unexpected riches from all the travels and produce new ingredients.
… and all that odd jazz!
